name: River Flood Levels
description: Examine flooding levels along a surface from a river source

inputs.name: Year
inputs.description: The year in which to simulate the flooding. Defaults to current.

inputs.name: Rise
inputs.description: The assumed local mean sea level rise per year to evalute in future scenarios. Defaults to 3

inputs.name: Surge
inputs.description: The local mean height of a typical storm surge. Defaults to 500

inputs.name: High Neap
inputs.description: The local mean high water neap tide

inputs.name: Low Neap
inputs.description: The local mean low water neap tide

inputs.name: High Spring
inputs.description: The local mean high water spring tide

inputs.name: Low Spring
inputs.description: The local mean low water neap tide

outputs.name: Storm Surge Level
outputs.description: The simulated mean storm surge level

outputs.name: High Neap
outputs.description: The simulated mean high water neap level

outputs.name: Low Neap
outputs.description: The simulated mean low water neap level

outputs.name: High Spring
outputs.description: The simulated mean high water spring level

outputs.name: Low Spring
outputs.description: The simulated mean low water spring level
